item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections total
item_prototype.description: Общее число коннектов к серверу.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections $2
item_prototype.description: The backend is executing a query.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections $2
item_prototype.description: The backend is waiting for a new client command.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections $2
item_prototype.description: The backend is in a transaction, but is not currently executing a query.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections $2
item_prototype.description: This state is similar to idle in transaction, except one of the statements in the transaction caused an error.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} bgwriter $2
item_prototype.description: Сколько раз фоновый процесс записи останавливал сброс грязных страниц на диск из-за того, что записал слишком много буферов.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} temp_bytes written
item_prototype.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} temp_files created
item_prototype.description: Number of temporary files created by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows returned by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Replication streaming clients
item_prototype.description: Кол-во клиентов репликации в статусе streaming.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Replication lag
item_prototype.description: Прошедшее время с момента получения последней транзакции с мастера.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} conf $2
item_prototype.description: Максимальное число соединений.

trigger_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Connections limit will soon be reached
Postgres: @{#CLNAME} No replication client
trigger_prototype.description: Репликация не настроена, либо все реплики отключены.

trigger_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Replication lag is critical
trigger_prototype.description: Прошло много время с момента получения последней транзакции с мастера.

trigger_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} Replication lag is much
trigger_prototype.description: Реплика не успевает применять последние транзакции с мастера.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} database size
item_prototype.description: Disk space used by the database with the specified name.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} temp_bytes written
item_prototype.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} temp_files created
item_prototype.description: Number of temporary files created by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows returned by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME} $2 per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME}.{#TBNAME} indexes size
item_prototype.description: Total disk space used by indexes attached to the specified table.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME}.{#TBNAME} relation size
item_prototype.description: Disk space used by the specified fork ('main', 'fsm', 'vm', or 'init') of the specified table or index.

item_prototype.name: Postgres: @{#CLNAME} ={#DBNAME}.{#TBNAME} total size
item_prototype.description: Total disk space used by the specified table, including all indexes and TOAST data.
